author: Team Latestly
title: Good Friday 2024 Wishes: PM Narendra Modi, Mamata Banerjee and Other Leaders Extend Greetings to Christians on the Day That Marks the Crucifixion of Jesus Christ | ðŸ“° LatestLY
text: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee and other political leaders took to X to wish people on Good Friday 2024. PM Narendra Modi recalled the sacrifice of Jesus Christ on the occasion of Good Friday. He took to X and wrote â€œToday, on Good Friday, we remember the profound sacrifice of Jesus Christ. May everyone find strength in the lessons of compassion and forgiveness it teaches us.â€ Good Friday is a significant day for the Christian community, in order to commemorate the crucifixion of Jesus Christ. It is observed as a public holiday in several countries including India, Canada, the UK, Germany, Australia, Bermuda, Brazil, Finland, Malta, Mexico, New Zealand, Singapore and Sweden, among others. Good Friday 2024 Date, History and Significance: Know All About the Day That Marks the Crucifixion of Jesus Christ in the Holy Week. Good Friday 2024 Wishes Today, on Good Friday, we remember the profound sacrifice of Jesus Christ. May everyone find strength in the lessons of compassion and forgiveness it teaches us. â€” Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) March 29, 2024 Wishing all my Christian Brothers & Sisters a graceful & blessed Good Friday. May this Holy Day of Penance, Prayers and Sacrifice inspire us all to live a life of compassion, love and peace. â€” Mamata Banerjee (@MamataOfficial) March 29, 2024 On the auspicious occasion of Good Friday, let's remember the supreme sacrifice and love that guides us toward compassion, love, forgiveness, and unity. May this Good Friday be a time of reflection, renewal, and grace for all. pic.twitter.com/XrNxlAG74I â€” Kiren Rijiju (à¤®à¥‹à¤¦à¥€ à¤•à¤¾ à¤ªà¤°à¤¿à¤µà¤¾à¤°) (@KirenRijiju) March 29, 2024 On this #GoodFriday, let us solemnly remember the suffering, sacrifice and boundless love of Lord Jesus Christ. May His teachings of compassion and forgiveness inspire us to walk the path of peace and unity. pic.twitter.com/DctT8nzp1H â€” Dr. Pramod Sawant (Modi Ka Parivar) (@DrPramodPSawant) March 29, 2024 On #GoodFriday, we reflect on the profound teachings of Lord Jesus Christ, who exemplified compassion and selflessness in alleviating the burdens of humanity. His sacrifice continues to inspire us to strive for a world of peace, love, and understanding. ðŸ™ pic.twitter.com/incnJZNRIQ â€” Niranjan Patnaik (@NPatnaikOdisha) March 29, 2024

author: Tanguy REVAULT
title: Conseil lecture : "Une annÃ©e autour du monde", en partenariat avec le magazine GÃ©o
text:
Cet almanach, en partenariat avec le magazine GEO, invite Ã  explorer le monde en 52 semaines Ã  travers 12 rubriques mÃªlant gÃ©ographie, patrimoine, nature et culture. Chaque semaine, le lecteur dÃ©couvre des destinations, des traditions, des peuples et des merveilles naturelles ou architecturales, en Europe, en [Asie](/destination/asie/) et dans toutes les rÃ©gions du monde. Des rubriques originales comme "Zoom sur" ou "Mots d'ailleurs" enrichissent l'expÃ©rience. FidÃ¨le Ã  l'esprit de GEO, l'almanach suit les saisons et propose quiz, rÃ©cits et dÃ©couvertes culturelles. Une immersion ludique et instructive pour les passionnÃ©s de voyages et de connaissances du monde. Plus d'informations en cliquant sur ce [lien](https://www.lisez.com/livre-grand-format/une-annee-autour-du-monde/9782263187391).

author: sollunaresort
title: Resorts in Corbett
text:
Many people consider Solluna Resort to be among Jim Corbett National Park's greatest resorts. It provides a calm get-away from the bustle of the city, nestled by the Ramganga River and surrounded by lush flora. The resort offers opulent bungalows that are individually styled to appeal to each of the five senses. Activities available to guests include nature hikes, animal safaris, and bird viewing. In addition, Solluna offers upscale dining establishments and a swimming pool, guaranteeing a luxurious and relaxing stay. Solluna is a popular destination because of its peaceful atmosphere and close proximity to Corbett's main attractions.

author: @andaluciainf
title: AbÃ¡s pide el fin del "rÃ­o de sangre" del pueblo palestino en su mensaje de Navidad | AndalucÃ­a InformaciÃ³n. Todas las noticias de Huelva
text: El presidente palestino, Mahmud AbÃ¡s, pidiÃ³ hoy el fin del "rio de sangre" y de los "inmensos sacrificios" del pueblo palestino en un mensaje de felicitaciÃ³n de Navidad, celebraciÃ³n que cobra especial relevancia en BelÃ©n, donde la tradiciÃ³n cristiana ubica el nacimiento de JesÃºs. "El rÃ­o de sangre, los inmensos sacrificios, las penurias y la heroica resiliencia de nuestro pueblo en su tierra son el camino hacia la libertad y la dignidad", afirmÃ³ el presidente de la Autoridad Palestina, que gobierna zonas reducidas de Cisjordania ocupada. Cada 24 de diciembre, BelÃ©n -centro de la comunidad cristiana palestina- celebra un tradicional desfile con bandas de mÃºsica, previo a la llegada del Patriarca Latino de JerusalÃ©n a pie para oficiar una misa en la Iglesia de Santa Catalina, la parte catÃ³lica basÃ­lica de la Natividad. Pero este aÃ±o, el patriarca Pierbattista Pizzaballa -el enviado religioso del Vaticano a Tierra Santa- llegarÃ¡ a BelÃ©n en una procesiÃ³n solemne, sin mÃºsica ni actos festivos, de luto por el alto nÃºmero de muertos palestinos en la guerra en la Franja de Gaza, que superan los 20.200 mientras prosigue la ofensiva israelÃ­. Cisjordania ocupada tambiÃ©n ha vivido su aÃ±o mÃ¡s mortÃ­fero desde 2002, el pico de violencia de la Segunda Intifada, con unos 510 muertos, mÃ¡s de la mitad desde el 7 de octubre, cuando comenzÃ³ la guerra en el enclave. AbÃ¡s expresÃ³ hoy, dÃ­a de Nohebuena, su esperanza de que esta Navidad marque el cese de la guerra israelÃ­ contra el pueblo palestino en Gaza y el resto de territorios palestinos ocupados, deseando "prosperidad y estabilidad para el pueblo palestino y todas las naciones". "El sol de la libertad y [nuestro] Estado independiente con JerusalÃ©n como capital estÃ¡ inevitablemente surgiendo, casi a nuestro alcance", afirmÃ³ el presidente en su discurso de Navidad. "El pueblo palestino estÃ¡ decidido a continuar su lucha para lograr sus derechos legÃ­timos, el principal de los cuales es el derecho a un Estado independiente y plenamente soberano, donde puedan vivir con dignidad en su patria", agregÃ³. El presidente palestino tambiÃ©n rindiÃ³ homenaje a los miles de "mÃ¡rtires de Palestina", deseÃ³ una pronta recuperaciÃ³n para los heridos, libertad para los prisioneros y orÃ³ por la preservaciÃ³n del pueblo palestino en Gaza, Cisjordania, JerusalÃ©n y la diÃ¡spora. EnvÃ­a tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)

author: @bcnmetropolitan
title: Madama Butterfly - (barcelona-metropolitan.com)
text:
Madama Butterfly
to
[Gran Teatre del Liceu](https://www.barcelona-metropolitan.com/locations/gran-teatre-de-liceu-/)
La Rambla 51-59, 08002 Barcelona
Image courtesy of the Liceu.
Madama Butterfly by Giacomo Puccini is among the most acclaimed and frequently performed operas around the world. Not many operas move the audience like this early 20th century masterpiece (1904). Based on the theatrical drama by David Belasco, its marvelous orchestration and melodic inspiration, truthful and at the same time exotic and highly passionate, is one of the most tragic and at the same time penetrating and emotional stories of all time.
By adapting David Belasco's Madame Butterfly (based on a folktale by John Luther Long), which he saw in London in 1900, Puccini achieved a score that is both gargantuan and fascinating: a true masterpiece. He collaborated with librettists Luigi Illica and Giuseppe Giacosa to adapt the tragic story of Cio-Cio-San. Cio-Cio-San, the young Japanese bride of US naval officer Lieutenant Pinkerton, represents a broken dream: she believes she is embarking on a real marriage, but it is actually a short-lived romance, shattered when he abandons her shortly after they marry. She lives her life in the hope of his return; a tragic dream. She, who renounced her religion and community, learns too late that, for Pinkerton, her marriage is merely an illusion, with tragic consequences.
Three years later, Cio-Cio-San and her son, Dolore, see Pinkerton's ship in the harbour. She excitedly awaits his visit, but when Pinkerton and his American wife Kate arrive and want to take the boy to America, Cio-Cio-San says goodbye to her son and takes her own life.
For more music events, check our online
[events calendar](https://www.barcelona-metropolitan.com/search/event/whats-on-in-barcelona-music).
Info
[Gran Teatre del Liceu](https://www.barcelona-metropolitan.com/locations/gran-teatre-de-liceu-/)La Rambla 51-59, 08002 Barcelona

author: Guest
title: Don Kusler: Democrats dominated 2023 with victories for reproductive rights, labor
text:
2023 was a good year for Democrats and their issues at the ballot box.
Virginia put MAGA-allied politicians with higher aspirations, such as Gov. Glenn Youngkin, on notice. Democrats maintained control of the Virginia Senate and regained control of its House control, halting Youngkin's agenda for his final two years in office.
That's a victory for Democrats.
Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear won an unlikely reelection. This provided Democrats with an interesting snapshot into how to govern and campaign in a progressive way yet connect with a challenging electorate.
That's another victory for the left.
Two ballot initiative in Ohio favored Democratic positions. The first was a crass attempt by Ohio Republicans to head off a November ballot measure protecting a womanâ€™s right to choose. By conducting a special election aimed at requiring a supermajority for public ballot measures to become law, this measure challenged both womenâ€™s rights and our democracy. The vote wasnâ€™t close in what has become a deeply Republican state.
People are also readingâ€¦
Then on the November ballot, a measure protecting reproductive choice passed by a similar margin.
These electoral victories make a difference.
Just look at two Midwestern states that used Democratic majorities paired with Democratic governors to gain a range of legislative victories. In Michigan and Minnesota, Democratic control brought gun safety laws, protections for reproductive rights and LGBTQ+ communities, climate-friendly measures and more ability of workers to organize.
Labor, a traditional Democratic bloc, repeatedly made gains this past year by standing up, speaking out and winning favorable contracts.
Workers already had notched victories at Amazon and Starbucks in 2022. This trend continued in 2023 with the headline-grabbing strikes for writers in the entertainment industry and auto workers.
Sometimes victory comes more in the form of problems for your opponents. The year 2023 proved that point for Democrats with a stack of woes for Republicans.
It was hard not to see that the Republican Party remains wrapped tightly around the little finger of dictator-in-waiting Donald Trump. His legal woes -- business wrongdoing in New York, the careless handling of sensitive documents, and insurrectionist behavior on a national scale -- contrast nicely for Democrats against their governing and electoral successes.
The Republican-controlled House of Representatives provides another contrast with its chaotic and dysfunctional running of the peopleâ€™s business.
Leadership elections seems pretty straightforward. The party with the most members elects a speaker and goes about its work. Not so with the 2023 Republican House Caucus. It took four days and 15 votes to get Rep. Kevin McCarthy, R-Calif., as their speaker. Then came a series of bizarre and fruitless political projects including committee hearings, impeachment inquiries and bills with no meaningful results for the people.
The one exception was a deal McCarthy finally made on the most basic of functions -- funding the government. But that promptly cost him his job.
Did the chaos subside? Well, no. More speaker votes and infighting followed over the next three weeks until Rep. Mike Johnson, R-La., was finally elected speaker.
The sum of this very public display of broken and unfit leadership for Republicans can be seen as nothing other than a victory for Democrats.
So a quick review of the naughty vs. nice list shows Republicans with a 2023 record filled with dysfunction, contrasting nicely with the Democrats' roster of electoral, legislative and ally victories.
Yes, 2023 was a good year for Democrats.
Kusler is the national director of Americans for Democratic Action:
adaction.org. He wrote this for InsideSources.com.

author: LW
title: Estado de salud del Papa Francisco HOY 21 de febrero: "No corre peligro, pero hay que rezar" | MARCA MÃ©xico
text:
E l Papa Francisco fue hospitalizado el pasado viernes 14 de febrero de 2025 por una neumonÃ­a doble . De acuerdo con los reportes, el PontÃ­fice se encuentra internado en el hospital Gemelli de Roma , donde ha recibido el tratamiento y los cuidados pertinentes para aliviar las dificultades respiratorias que padece.
Este dÃ­a se han dado a conocer actualizaciones sobre el estado de salud del Papa Francisco. A continuaciÃ³n, les presentamos cÃ³mo se encuentra y lo que los mÃ©dicos han dicho sobre su proceso de recuperaciÃ³n.
Papa Francisco padece neumonÃ­a bilateral, el Vaticano anuncia un "cuadro complejo" x Estado de salud del Papa Francisco HOY Viernes 21 de febrero MÃ©dicos que han tratado al Papa Francisco en dÃ­as recientes por la neumonÃ­a que lo llevÃ³ a ser internado dieron a conocer el estado de salud del PontÃ­fice hasta hoy viernes 21 de febrero de 2025.
El doctor Sergio Alfieri brindÃ³ informes en una rueda de prensa realizada en el hospital Gemelli. En ella revelÃ³ que el Papa " no estÃ¡ fuera de peligro " y que deberÃ¡ permanecer ingresado por al menos toda la prÃ³xima semana.
Les podemos decir que el Papa estÃ¡ mejor. No podemos dar un parte mÃ©dico largo todos los dÃ­as. El tratamiento es lento.
Â¿CÃ³mo se encuentra el Papa Francisco? De acuerdo con los reportes, el Papa Francisco continÃºa respirando por sÃ­ solo y no necesita aporte de oxÃ­geno. Asimismo, los mÃ©dicos mencionaron que Su santidad " mantiene buen humor " a pesar de la bronquitis que tiene.
Francisco continuarÃ¡ asÃ­ su terapia y su proceso de recuperaciÃ³n en el nosocomio ubicado en la capital de Italia. Al momento, no se conoce una fecha exacta en la que podrÃ­a ser dado de alta para regresar al Vaticano .
Â¿QuÃ© le pasÃ³ al Papa Francisco? Enfermad y por quÃ© fue hospitalizado Fue el pasado viernes 14 de febrero que medio internacionales informaron que el Papa Francisco fue ingresado en el hospital Gemelli de Roma. Los reportes mencionaron que se debiÃ³ a problemas de respiraciÃ³n , resultado de una bronquitis por infecciÃ³n polimicrobiolÃ³gica , a la cual se le habrÃ­a sumado una neumonÃ­a bilateral.
Posteriormente, fuentes reportaron que la enfermedad del lÃ­der de la Iglesia CatÃ³lica es una neumonÃ­a localizada en determinados lÃ³bulos o puntos del pulmÃ³n del Papa.
Edad y nombre real del Papa Francisco El Papa Francisco tiene actualmente 88 aÃ±os de edad . Jorge Mario Bergoglio , nombre real de Su Santidad, naciÃ³ en 17 de diciembre de 1936 en Flores, Buenos Aires, Argentina.
Jorge Bergoglio es Soberano del Estado de la Ciudad del Vaticano desde el 2013.
